DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Daily Pro-Omega LDL Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Triglyceride Reduction
DOC.criteria: Men woman , ≥18 year age . History ( > 3months ) LDLC ≥130 mg/dl ≤190 mg/dL Triglycerides ( TG ) > 200 < 750 mg/dL Able understand cooperate study procedure , sign write informed consent prior study procedure . Willing maintain stable diet level activity throughout trial . Willing maintain current activity level diet throughout trial . If , childbearing age , must medically approve form birth control identify investigator trial History ( > 3 month ) take statin medication ( HMGCoA reductase inhibitor , include Lipitor , Zocor , Crestor , Pravachol , Lescol , Livalo ) without problem , would willing withdraw statin duration trial ( 4 week without statin prior randomization washout period , treatment protocol medication 10 week duration trial ) Individuals intolerance , allergy red yeast rice omega 3 fatty acid . Individuals currently take statin ( HMGCoA Reductase inhibitor ) include Lipitor , Zocor , Crestor , Pravachol , Lescol , Livalo ) lipid metabolism alter product within four ( 4 ) week prior randomization wish withdraw therapy . Individual take prescription counter medication ( include dietary supplement ) know alter lipid metabolism within four ( 4 ) week randomization . Medications exclude within 4 week randomization : prescription omega3 fatty acid , statin , bile acid sequestrants , cholesterol absorption inhibitor , niacin fibrates . Dietary supplement exclude within 4 week prior randomization : Lcarnitine , policosanol , guggulipid , sterol/stanol product , red rice yeast supplement , garlic supplement , soy isoflavone supplement , niacin analogue , probiotic dietary fiber supplement ( include > 2 teaspoon Metamucil psylliumcontaining supplement per day prebiotics ) , dietary supplement vitamin complex product contain omega 3 acid fish oil . Use systemic corticosteroid , androgen ( except androgen hypogonadism restore normal level ) , phenytoin , erythromycin macrolides , thyroid hormone ( except stabledose thyroid replacement therapy four ( 4 ) week prior enrollment ) . Use anticoagulant warfarin ( Coumadin ) dabigatran ( Pradaxa ) , apixaban ( Eliquis ) rivaroxaban ( Xarelto ) . Pregnant lactate woman , woman childbearing potential complying approve method contraception . A woman consider childbearing potential unless posthysterectomy , one year postmenopausal , one year posttubal ligation . Individuals history myopathy , define creatine phosphokinase ( CPK ) > 450 U/L and/or unexplained muscle pain statin . Type I type II diabetes mellitus HbA1c ≥7.0 % History significant cardiovascular coronary heart disease ( CVD CHD ) define coronary artery bypass procedure , coronary stent angioplasty , myocardial infarction . Current recent ( within six month ) history significant gastrointestinal , renal , pulmonary , hepatic biliary disease History cancer , nonmelanoma skin cancer basal cell carcinoma , within previous five year . Poorly control uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≥95 mm Hg ) . Recent history ( within past 6 month ) excessive alcohol use , define > 14 drink per week ( One drink = 12 oz . beer , 4 oz . wine , 1.5 oz . hard liquor ) .
